means: （使某物）旋转[转动]( rotate的现在分词 )
（使某人或某物）轮流[按顺序循环]

sentence.Network_en: The European Union's rotating presidency passed from Sweden to Belgium.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧盟轮值主席国由瑞典换成了比利时。

sentence.Network_en: The large rotating fans whirred continually.
sentence.Network_cn: 大大的风扇没完没了地嗡嗡转着。

sentence.Network_en: All the light bars were turned on which filled the room with these rotating beams of light.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有灯条都打开了，满屋都是旋转的光柱。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 航海及海运专业英语词汇(R5) ... rotating 旋转的转动的 rotating 转动的 rotating-blade propeller 平旋推进器.
design of regulator in the rotating - wheels synchronized operation system ., 旋轮同步系统中的调节器设计.
rotating 旋转的rotating 旋转的转动的rotating 转动的

list.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... resistor 电阻器 rotator 旋转器 flexor 曲肌.
转字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 转轴，转轴儿〖 spinaxis〗 转子〖 rotator〗 转字锁〖 combinationlock〗.
旋转也可通过选择定位菜单下的旋转(Rotate)指令完成。你可在对话框中输入固定角度来完成。
... circle 环绕； rotate 旋转，循环； wind 缠绕。.
常用物理英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... rotating magnetic field 旋转磁场 rotation 自转，转动 Rutherford scattering 卢瑟福散射.
自字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 自传〖 autobiography〗 自转〖 rotation〗 自装〖 self-chambering〗.

entry.def: When something rotates or when you rotate it, it turns with a circular movement.

example.ex: The Earth rotates round the sun...
Take each foot in both your hands and rotate it to loosen and relax the ankle.
example.tran: 双手抓住自己的双脚，转动一下，以放松脚踝。

entry.def: If people or things rotate, or if someone rotates them, they take it in turns to do a particular job or serve a particular purpose.

example.ex: The members of the club can rotate and one person can do all the preparation for the evening...
example.tran: 俱乐部的成员可以轮流工作，而且一个人就能做好晚上的所有准备工作。

example.ex: They will swap posts in a year's time, according to new party rules which rotate the leadership.
example.tran: 根据轮流担任领导的新政党章程，他们在一年后会轮换职位。

auth_sentence.content: France assumes the Council's rotating presidency next month.
auth_sentence.res_content: France assumes the Council's rotating presidency next month.

auth_sentence.content: The ship will have two rotating pods to simulate gravity.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ship will have two rotating pods to simulate gravity.
